item.description:
Whether you are already active in the effort of bringing peace to the world or you now wish to begin participating in this endeavor, this seminar will introduce you to new and powerful ways of working toward this all-important goal. The mystics of all times and cultures have long stated that the most effective methods of bringing change to the world lie in the inner practices of its many individuals. Join us for this seminar, as we explore and experience the powerful inner practices of the mystics that will be paramount in bringing the Earth into ever-deepening peace and harmony.

Light lunch included.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar: Achieving World Peace by Finding Inner Peace
